Package org.wmn4j.notation

Class GraceNoteChord

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wmn4j.notation.GraceNoteChord
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<GraceNote>, Ornamental
    public final class GraceNoteChord
extends java.lang.Object
implements Ornamental, java.lang.Iterable<GraceNote>
    Represents a chord consisting of grace notes.

    This class is immutable.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.wmn4j.notation.Ornamental

    • Method Detail

      • of

        public static GraceNoteChord of​(java.util.Collection<GraceNote> notes)
        Returns an instance with the given GraceNotes.
        Parameters:
        notes - A non-empty and non-null Collection of GraceNote objects
        Returns:
        a chord with the given notes
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if notes is null.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if notes is empty or all GraceNote objects in notes are do not have same displayable duration and grace note type.

      • getNote

        public GraceNote getNote​(int fromLowest)
        Returns the GraceNote at the given index counting from lowest pitch in this GraceNoteChord.
        Parameters:
        fromLowest - index of note, 0 being the lowest note in the chord
        Returns:
        the note from index fromLowest
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if fromLowest is smaller than 0 or at least the number of notes in this chord
